generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with tram tracks and lane markings, which is clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A pedestrian sidewalk is visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and marked with red pavement on the left side.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial storefronts and residential structures.
- wall: A stone wall is visible along the side of the brick building on the right.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic sign poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible in the distance, hanging over the road.
- traffic sign: A "No Trucks" sign and a right-turn arrow sign are visible on the right side of the road.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and road, with some leaves on the ground.
- terrain: Grass is visible on the right side of the road, adjacent to the sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk on the left side of the road, and another person is standing on the right side.
- car: A red car is parked on the left side of the road, and several other cars are visible further down the road.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, being ridden by a person.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible in the distance, being ridden by a person.
- train: No train is visible in the image.
- bus: No bus is visible in the image.
